languages.text:
Рапорт кают-мастера.
Убыль экипажа — 87%. Ввиду гибели дежурного трансмеханика с палубы технопровидцев, докладываю, что разрушения корабля обширны и всеобъемлющи. Оценка пока производится.

traits.locale_text:
Рапорт кают-мастера.
Убыль экипажа — 87%. Ввиду гибели дежурного трансмеханика с палубы технопровидцев, докладываю, что разрушения корабля обширны и всеобъемлющи. Оценка пока производится.

languages.text:
Master Steward's report
Crew losses: 87%. Due to the death of the acting Transmechanic on the Enginseer deck, I am reporting that the damage to the ship is widespread and all-encompassing. We are running diagnostics now.
languages.original_text:
Рапорт кают-мастера.
Убыль экипажа — 87%. Ввиду гибели дежурного трансмеханика с палубы технопровидцев, докладываю, что разрушения корабля обширны и всеобъемлющи. Оценка пока производится.

traits.locale_text:
Master Steward's report
Crew losses: 87%. Due to the death of the acting transmechanic on the enginseer deck, I am reporting that the damage to the ship is widespread and all-encompassing. We are running diagnostics now.

Master Steward's report
Crew losses: 87%. Due to the death of the acting Transmechanic on the enginseer deck, I am reporting that the damage to the ship is widespread and all-encompassing. We are running diagnostics now.

languages.text:
Informe del maestro administrador
Bajas de la tripulación: 87 %. A causa de la muerte del transmecánico de guardia en la cubierta de visioingenieros, me corresponde informar de que el daño sufrido por la nave es generalizado y catastrófico. Estamos ejecutando diagnósticos.
languages.original_text:
Master Steward's report
Crew losses: 87%. Due to the death of the acting Transmechanic on the Enginseer deck, I am reporting that the damage to the ship is widespread and all-encompassing. We are running diagnostics now.

traits.locale_text:
Informe del maestro administrador
Bajas de la tripulación: 87 %. A causa de la muerte del transmecánico de guardia en la cubierta de visioingenieros, me corresponde informar de que el daño sufrido por la nave es generalizado y catastrófico. Estamos ejecutando diagnósticos.

languages.text:
总管的报告
船员损失：87%。由于引擎先知甲板的代理传讯修士死亡，现在由我进行报告。舰船各个区域都收到了相当程度的损坏，目前正在评估受损情况。
languages.original_text:
Master Steward's report
Crew losses: 87%. Due to the death of the acting Transmechanic on the Enginseer deck, I am reporting that the damage to the ship is widespread and all-encompassing. We are running diagnostics now.

traits.locale_text:
总管的报告
船员损失：87%。由于引擎先知甲板的代理传讯修士死亡，现在由我进行报告。舰船各个区域都收到了相当程度的损坏，目前正在评估受损情况。

languages.text:
給仕長の報告
クルーの損失：87%。機関整備師デッキで代理のトランスメカニックが死亡したため、船への被害が広範囲かつ全体的に広がったことを報告します。現在診断を実行中です。
languages.original_text:
Master Steward's report
Crew losses: 87%. Due to the death of the acting Transmechanic on the Enginseer deck, I am reporting that the damage to the ship is widespread and all-encompassing. We are running diagnostics now.

traits.locale_text:
給仕長の報告
クルーの損失：87%。機関整備師デッキで代理のトランスメカニックが死亡したため、船への被害が広範囲かつ全体的に広がったことを報告します。現在診断を実行中です。

languages.text:
Bericht des Master Steward
Besatzungsverluste: 87%. Aufgrund des Todes des amtierenden Transmechanikers auf dem Maschinendeck melde ich, dass die Schäden am Schiff weit verbreitet und allumfassend sind. Wir führen jetzt eine Diagnose durch.
languages.original_text:
Master Steward's report
Crew losses: 87%. Due to the death of the acting Transmechanic on the Enginseer deck, I am reporting that the damage to the ship is widespread and all-encompassing. We are running diagnostics now.

languages.text:
Rapport du maître intendant
Pertes au sein de l'équipage : 87 %. En raison de la mort du transmécanicien suppléant sur le pont des technaugures, j'ai la charge de rapporter que les dégâts subis par le vaisseau sont importants et généralisés. Des diagnostics sont en cours.
languages.original_text:
Master Steward's report
Crew losses: 87%. Due to the death of the acting Transmechanic on the Enginseer deck, I am reporting that the damage to the ship is widespread and all-encompassing. We are running diagnostics now.

traits.locale_text:
Rapport du maître intendant
Pertes au sein de l'équipage : 87 %. En raison de la mort du transmécanicien suppléant sur le pont des technaugures, j'ai la charge de rapporter que les dégâts subis par le vaisseau sont importants et généralisés. Des diagnostics sont en cours.

languages.text:
Başidareci'nin raporu
Mürettebat kaybı: %87. Mühedyum güvertesinde görevli Transmekanik'in ölümü nedeniyle raporu ben vermekteyim. Gemide geniş çaplı hasar mevcuttur. Tam teşhisler şu an gerçekleştirilmektedir.
languages.original_text:
Master Steward's report
Crew losses: 87%. Due to the death of the acting Transmechanic on the Enginseer deck, I am reporting that the damage to the ship is widespread and all-encompassing. We are running diagnostics now.

traits.locale_text:
Başidareci'nin raporu
Mürettebat kaybı: %87. Vekil Transmekanik'in mühedyum güvertesindeki ölümü nedeniyle, geminin her bölgeyi kapsayan geniş çaplı bir hasar aldığı raporunu ben vermekteyim. Hasar tanısı şu anda gerçekleştiriliyor.
